_source.text: According to Baljit Singh, head of Penang Gerakan legal and human rights bureau, Najib and his ministers, their deputies and parliamentary secretaries must prove that they were better than Opposition Leader Anwar Ibrahim.

text: According to **Baljit** **Singh**, head of Penang Gerakan legal and human rights bureau, Najib and his
ministers, their deputies and parliamentary secretaries must prove that they were **better** **than** Opposition Leader Anwar Ibrahim.
